europeana:record.dc:title: The benthic hydroid fauna of the Chafarinas Islands (Alborán Sea, western Mediterranean)
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Peña Cantero A.L.
García Carrascosa A.M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Invertebrata: overige
Hydrozoa
hydroids
benthos
biodiversity
ecology
biogeography
new species
europeana:record.dc:description: The benthic hydroid fauna of the Chafarinas Islands (Western Mediterranean), collected during a survey in the summer of 1991, has been studied. A total of 86 species, 20 athecate hydroids and 66 thecate hydroids, has been recorded. For every species, the synonymy, a survey of the material studied and data concerning ecology and distribution are included. The majority of the species has been figured and the most important have been (re)described.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: The benthic hydroid fauna of the Chafarinas Islands (Alborán Sea, western Mediterranean) (Volume 337)
